title: US Navy chief defends plan to scrap troubled warships even though some are less than 3 years old - CNN
content:
1. US Navy chief defends plan to scrap troubled warships even though some are less than 3 years old  CNN
  2. Navy's top brass defends plan to cut ships from fleet  13News Now
  3. Navy Risks Blowback in Bid to Scrap $5 Billion of Troubled Ships  Bloomberg
  4. USS Wichita slated to be scrapped by Navy after only 3 years. Can our ship be saved?  Wichita Eagle
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The chief of the US Navy defended the service's plans to scrap nine relatively new warships in the coming fiscal year even as the service tries to keep up with China's growing fleet. Three of the littoral combat ships slated for decommissioning are less than three years old.
